title: Payment Agent List Request
description: Will return a list of Payment Agents for a given country for a given currency. Payment agents allow Binary.com users to deposit and withdraw funds using local payment methods that might not be available via the main Binary.com cashier system.

paymentagent_list.title: Payment Agent Target Country
paymentagent_list.description: Client's 2-letter country code (obtained from residence_list call).

currency.description: [Optional] If specified, only payment agents that supports that currency will be returned (obtained from payout_currencies call).

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
